project_descr: LEGAL EMPOWERMENT OF THE POOR & FORMALIZATION OF THE INFORMAL SECTOR

outputs.output_descr: The Project aims at addressing the institutional gaps and challenges regarding property and business environments, encouraging the poor in the informal sector entities to enter the formal system. This will be through offering them as an incentive those essential legal tools that will not only improve their life standard  and business, but helps transform their society, preserves their property rights, organizes their businesses and identifies mechanisms to access expanded markets, nationally and internationally.

project_title: legal empower.of the poor & form.of the informal sector
